beer.beer_description: Summoned from the depths exclusively for the Carwyn Cellars Canvent 2025 calendar, behold Fruit Brute! We sacrificed ungodly amounts of mango and raspberry to create this manic monster. It's a brutally dry, effervescent, and violently juicy Brut IPA. This low-bitterness summer smasher is the result of a tropical fever dream we can't take back.

items.checkin_comment:
Carwyn Canvent 2025 #18:
I get heaps more raspberry than mango, and thereâ€™s a lot of raspberry! Slight funk, dry finish. Kinda liked it less the more it went on.
